00010 Expression::Expression(const string& s) {
00011   tokens.clear();
00012   for (unsigned k=0; k<s.size(); k++) {
00013     Token t(s[k]);
00014     if (t.valid()) {
00015       tokens.push_back(t);
00016     }
00017   }
00018 }

00027 bool Expression::check() const {
00028   int depth = 0;
00029   for (int k=0; k<size(); k++) {
00030     switch(tokens[k].tt) {
00031     case variable:
00032     case constant:
00033       depth++;
00034       break;
00035     case binary_op:
00036       depth--;
00037       break;
00038     case unary_op:
00039       break;
00040     case invalid:
00041       cerr << "This shouldn't happen!" << endl;
00042       break;
00043     }
00044     if (depth < 0) return false;
00045   }
00046   if (depth != 1) return false;
00047   return true;
00048 }
00049 
00050 set<char> Expression::variables() const {
00051   set<char> ans;
00052   for (int k=0; k<size(); k++) {
00053     Token T = tokens[k];
00054     if (T.tt == variable) {
00055       char ch = T.tv;
00056       ans.insert(ch);
00057     }
00058   }
00059   return ans;
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool Expression::evaluate(const LookupTable& Tab) const {
00063   stack<bool> S;
00064   for (int k=0; k<size(); k++) {
00065     Token t = tokens[k];
00066     char ch;
00067     bool v,w;
00068     switch(t.tt) {
00069     case variable:
00070       ch = t.tv;
00071       v = Tab.lookup(ch);
00072       S.push(v);
00073       break;
00074     case constant:
00075       S.push(t.tv);
00076       break;
00077     case unary_op:   // note: - is only unary we have
00078       v = S.top();
00079       S.pop();
00080       S.push(!v);
00081       break;
00082 
00083     case binary_op:
00084       v = S.top(); S.pop();  // v is top
00085       w = S.top(); S.pop();  // w is next-to-top
00086       switch (t.tv) {
00087       case AND:
00088         S.push(v&&w);
00089         break;
00090       case OR:
00091         S.push(v||w);
00092         break;
00093       case IF_THEN:  //  w --> v
00094         S.push((!w)||v);
00095         break;
00096       case THEN_IF:  // v --> w
00097         S.push((!v)||w);
00098         break;
00099       case IFF:
00100         S.push(v==w);
00101         break;
00102       }
00103       break;
00104 
00105 
00106     case invalid:
00107       cerr << "This ought not happen!" << endl;
00108       break;
00109     }
00110   } 
00111   return S.top();
00112 }
